Emerging markets brace for wave of elections with fiscal discipline at stakeEmerging markets are gearing up for their biggest election year in decades, with investors focused on fiscal discipline and populist shifts that could stir markets and blur the outlook for some key economies. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 14:04:15 GMT B6ULKAITV5LFBPBPGX6JXBVHVNE https://www.reuters.com/world/emerging-markets-brace-wave-elections-with-fiscal-discipline-stake-2024-01-03/Karin Strohecker世界
Polish farmers to resume blockade of Ukraine border crossingPolish farmers will resume their blockade at the Medyka border crossing with Ukraine from Thursday as they say they have not received a signed assurance from the prime minister that their demands will be met, state-run news agency PAP reported. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 13:35:01 GMT FAPFO3BCBFJMNFMMW77MZYYABU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-farmers-resume-blockade-ukraine-border-crossing-2024-01-03/Reuters世界欧洲
European NATO members strike deal to buy up to 1,000 Patriot missilesNATO on Wednesday said its procurement arm would support a group of member countries, including Germany, the Netherlands, Romania and Spain, with a contract to buy up to 1,000 Patriot air defence missiles. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 13:08:29 GMT VATEYP5ELBJ3ZDEPAQRJ34GE24 https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/european-nato-members-strike-deal-buy-up-1000-patriot-missiles-2024-01-03/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
Bangladesh deploys army to keep peace ahead of Sunday's electionTroops deployed across Bangladesh on Wednesday amid fears of violence ahead of a national election which the main opposition party is boycotting. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 12:27:25 GMT WSYUG54IQNJFNNA6JGXKQTD7IQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/bangladesh-deploys-army-keep-peace-ahead-sundays-election-2024-01-03/Ruma Paul, Sudipto Ganguly世界亚太地区
Pakistan police probes killing of six barbers in northwestPakistani authorities on Wednesday said they were investigating the murder of six barbers in a tribal region that has long been a hotbed for militants looking to impose their version of strict Islamic law, which includes mandatory beards for men. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 12:06:42 GMT ESDZVHVGPVINTNPOD4HXY2UMNE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/pakistan-police-probes-killing-six-barbers-northwest-2024-01-03/Saud Mehsud世界亚太地区
Dozens killed in 'terrorist attacks' near tomb of Iranian Guards' SoleimaniTwo explosions caused by 'terrorist attacks' killed more than 70 people and wounded scores at a ceremony in Iran to commemorate top commander Qassem Soleimani who was killed in a 2020 U.S. drone attack, Iranian officials said on Wednesday. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 11:47:33 GMT KGCLOJAAPFMKZH42VPGQGQDIVM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-media-report-explosion-near-guards-commander-soleimanis-tomb-anniversary-2024-01-03/Reuters世界中东
Ugandan LGBT activist in critical condition after stabbingA prominent LGBT rights activist in Uganda, where sexual minorities say they have faced a wave of abuse since a harsh anti-gay law was enacted last year, was stabbed on Wednesday and is in critical condition, his organisation said. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 11:26:09 GMT LBPCMF4JJJKFVHO7ZQHMNNXM5A https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/ugandan-lgbt-activist-ritic-condition-after-stabbing-2024-01-03/Reuters世界非洲
Indonesia delays buying used fighter jets, cites fiscal limitsThe Indonesian government has delayed a plan to purchase 12 Mirage 2000-5 fighter jets previously used by Qatar, due to limited fiscal capacity, a spokesperson for the defence minister said. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 10:39:29 GMT AUEVYBZGTJNPXA6EHLDAKAAZE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesia-delays-buying-used-fighter-jets-cites-fiscal-limits-2024-01-03/Reuters世界亚太地区
Ex Pakistan PM Imran Khan charged with contempt of electoral watchdog - lawyerFormer Pakistan prime minister Imran Khan was charged on Wednesday with contempt of the electoral commission, his lawyer Naeem said, a move related to allegations he made derogatory remarks about the chief election commissioner. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 10:32:15 GMT X4QIE2Q4TJLV7F5LLFT4X57WHE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/ex-pakistan-pm-imran-khan-charged-with-contempt-electoral-watchdog-lawyer-2024-01-03/Reuters世界亚太地区
UN experts sound alarm over planned first US execution by nitrogen gasUnited Nations experts on Wednesday called on U.S. authorities not to go ahead with the planned execution of an inmate by nitrogen hypoxia, saying the method may subject him to "cruel, inhuman or degrading treatment or even torture". Wed, 03 Jan 2024 10:26:59 GMT KDFCKZGVP5IVLPNKGBAMLSAVCI https://www.reuters.com/world/us/un-experts-sound-alarm-over-planned-first-us-execution-by-nitrogen-gas-2024-01-03/Reuters世界美国
Philippine military says second joint patrol with US underway in South China SeaThe Philippines and the United States began a two-day joint patrol in the South China Sea on Wednesday, the Philippine military said in a statement, a move that would likely irk China. Wed, 03 Jan 2024 09:57:19 GMT NR5NLHLOOZLPLNQJGG7RZY4OQ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippine-military-says-second-joint-patrol-with-us-underway-south-china-sea-2024-01-03/Reuters世界亚太地区
